name: Go Land: The Consequences of Speedrunning
name_original: Go Land: The Consequences of Speedrunning
description:
Story:  "This once was a simple 3D platformer, but just before you could play it yourself, another player abused some exploits and  glitched out the whole game!  Now it's your job to clean up the mess by removing glitched items and "rewinding" the game back to how it used to be. "

This is what you need to fix. The game in its original state.

This game is very short, it can actually be beaten in a few minutes.   More levels may be added in the future, as it currently only has 2 or maybe 3 levels if you stretch a little.  

I hope this game at least is a little interesting, and please comment any problems or improvements that I can maybe improve for future projects.
